author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Rep. Dan Goldman (D-N.Y.) said Sunday he is not ready to endorse Zohran Mamdani, the Democratic nominee for mayor in New York City, citing concerns over rising antisemitism in the city. In an interview on CBS News New York’s “The Point with Marcia Kramer,” the moderate Democrat acknowledged his shared views with Mamdani on issues…
title: Goldman signals he’s not ready to endorse Mamdani, calls for ‘concrete action’ to address antisemitism

author: Mike Lillis
description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) warned Monday that Democrats won’t accept any Republican spending bill that makes life more expensive for working class people, pointing specifically to looming health care cuts as a “five-alarm fire” that must be addressed to win his party’s support for legislation preventing a shutdown. Just hours before he and…
title: Jeffries warns of ‘five-alarm fire’ on shutdown, looming health care cuts

author: Tara Suter
description: Former Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.) on Sunday slammed House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) over a statement praising New York City Mayor Eric Adams following Adams’s decision to end his reelection bid. “Are you kidding me? Eric Adams is corrupt and cut a corrupt deal with Trump to save himself,” Kinzinger said in a post…
title: Kinzinger knocks Jeffries for praising Eric Adams: ‘Are you kidding me?’

author: Lee Ann Anderson
description: President Trump alluded Monday to assured conflict with Democratic mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani if the assemblyman is elected New York’s 111th mayor. “Self proclaimed New York City Communist, Zohran Mamdani, who is running for Mayor, will prove to be one of the best things to ever happen to our great Republican Party,” Trump said on…
title: Trump: Mamdani will be ‘one of the best things’ to happen to GOP

author: Steven Lubet, opinion contributor
description: Economists from multiple conservative think tanks have weighed in against Antoni’s appointment, citing his inexperience and incompetence.
title: Even conservatives can’t get behind Trump’s Bureau of Labor Statistics pick

description: Federal and local authorities will provide an update on the fatal shooting at a church in Grand Blanc, Mich., on Sunday. A gunman opened fire at a Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints and set it ablaze, killing at least four people and wounding eight others. Watch Monday’s news conference, scheduled for 12:30 p.m. EDT,…
title: Watch live: Michigan church shooting update

author: Svante Myrick, opinion contributor
description: A colleague who is a lawyer and longtime advocate for freedom of speech and other civil liberties recently told me he’s never been more afraid about the future.  Who could blame him?  It is terrifying to see President Trump and his regime working to turn Charlie Kirk’s horrific assassination into the movement’s Reichstag fire — an…
title: In Kirk’s aftermath, we’re facing a long, hard fight for civil liberties

description: President Trump has high-stakes topics on his agenda Monday, as Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu visits the White House, just ahead of top congressional Democrats. Trump and Netanyahu are expected to discuss a new proposal for a ceasefire in Gaza. The Israeli leader said Sunday that details were still being worked out. Arab officials briefed…
title: Live updates: Trump, top Dems to meet on brink of shutdown; Netanyahu visits White House
